channel.title: 🏢 School of Data Science, University of Science and Technology of China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Data Science, University of Science and Technology of China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Stabilize the Latent Space for Image Autoregressive Modeling: A Unified Perspective
item.description: DiGIT stabilizes image autoregressive models’ latent space using a novel discrete tokenizer from self-supervised learning, achieving state-of-the-art image generation.
